Clarence Chua, Financial Planning Specialist at Prudential Assurance SingaporeTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 28 Jun 2019Price volatility is high and common in cryptocurrency. 
You may want to download an app such as coinmarketcap to track the price movement.Cryptocurrency is a high risk asset. If you are keen to invest in it, please DYOR and understand it and not just rush in.0 comments2
